Summary: watched black bell shape object with rotating ligh
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There were no other sightings in Houston on or around October 15th 1999
divs: Sighting DetailsStanding in front of firestation we were talking about a small plane circlingabove the firestation when we noticed a small white light moving from the northlooking about as bright as a satilite. The object then stopped and began to getlarger and the light began to rotate around the outside of the bell shape. Thelight was extremely white bright, the small single engine aircraft in the areacircled under the objec twice then left the area. We continued to watch theobject move very slow to the south. When we could not make out the shape wecould still see the very bright light flashing in the distance. The sightinglasted about 10 minutes because the object was moving so very slow. We finallylost sight because of the treeline near the station.
